section.title: Installing JBoss Tools Plugins
section.para: The Seam Tools plugin can be installed into Eclipse from the JBoss Tools update site. For more information, please read the Getting Started Guide.

section.title: Installing Seam Tools in JBoss Developer Studio
section.para: The Seam Tools feature comes installed with your JBoss Developer Studio instance. For more information on getting started with JBoss Developer Studio, see the Getting Started Guide
